items.name: Office 365 - A & E Technologies, LLC
items.description:
A & E Technologies, LLC provides outstanding service.  They have top notch consultants that specialize in the following areas:

Microsoft Licensing – Office 365 (CSP and OPEN Licensing)
Office 365 Implementation and Support
Exchange Online Implementation and Support
SharePoint Online Implementation and Support
Skype for Business Implementation and support
PC Support
Server Support
Managed Services

Our consultants are seasoned certified professionals with experience designing and implementing IT infrastructures for companies that range in size from 2 employees to over 100,000 employees. Technology changes quickly, we take pride in staying educated in the latest technologies and using proven techniques to make our projects more efficient. This allows us to spend less time and save you money. 

We realize there are a lot of choices out there. Our fast response time and total commitment to helping our clients meet or exceed their goals sets us apart from our competition.

items.name: ClearPointe
items.description:
ClearPointe is an authority on Azure based solutions. Whether running all or just a portion of your infrastructure in Azure, we have the expertise to design revolutionary solutions that integrate our unparalleled support.
 
ClearPointe offers clients a holistic approach for Azure based solutions. From migration planning and governance through execution, and beyond to daily management and scalability planning, ClearPointe delivers optimal performance for the life of your solution. This level of performance is consistently delivered through our Network Operations Center (NOC), the engine behind our managed services success. 

We believe a NOC is not defined by equipment and systems, but by the experience, expertise, and training of the people. ClearPointe employs the industry’s most prominent engineers. This gives us the ability to not only detect potential issues in real-time, but to also resolve those issues from detection to remediation without escalating or subcontracting outside our company. Clients have an actual name and number for someone who understands the complexities of their specific solution and the unique conditions of their infrastructure.

ClearPointe will also match all Microsoft funding dollars. We are experienced working through the approval process to secure available funding; and from our experience, we have learned that timeliness is essential. We have the nimbleness to craft statements of work and other essential documentation quickly and effectively. ClearPointe has worked with Microsoft to successfully receive CIF, BIF and Azure Everywhere dollars, and ClearPointe has matched all of these received dollars.

And for the modern workplace, ClearPointe has an abundance of Office 365 experience and excels in working with clients that have complex migrations including multiple domains, moving tenants and designing voice integrations with Skype. We offer O365 management that includes administrative support for Exchange (user creation and user termination scripting assistance, distribution list group creation and maintenance, etc.). Our management also support AD Azure Connect, MDM framework validation and eDiscovery compliance center assistance.  

With clients around the world, ClearPointe’s organizational structure and internal philosophies give us the agility to execute nimbly and responsively while never diminishing the integrity or commitment of our expertise. We are your single source for digital transformations.

items.name: ULTRA INC
items.description: Connecting Point was founded back in 1979 on the belief that technology would change the world and we have helped with that change one innovation and one customer at a time.   In the last 38 years, we've grown and technology has changed, but we still have the same core beliefs.  We believe that every company is distinct in what their IT needs are.  We customize solutions from Technology Solutions, Classroom Solutions, Service and Repair of Equipment, Managed Service, and Custom Cloud Solutions.

items.name: IMC Studios Incorporated
items.description: IMC Technology provides enterprise-level technology services at small business prices.

items.name: CloudBoltz Solutions
items.description:
At CloudBoltz we consult with you to Bolt-On Technology Solutions and Services to enhance your Organization's IT Experience

We are a Certified Microsoft Cloud Solution Provider, Nextiva Voice and Collaboration Partner, and offer a variety of Security Solutions. 

What our Clients Bolt-On from us

-Cloud-Based Voice and Collaboration
-Managed Microsoft Office 365
-Office 365 training platform
-Cloud Assessments and Security Consulting
-Broadband and Dedicated Internet Connectivity 
-Design and Migration Services
-Microsoft Azure Cloud Services and Scripting
-Single Sign On for Cloud Applications
-SOC(Security Operations Center) as a Service
-Software Application Adoption Services
-DevOps as a Service
-NextGen Firewalls and Management
-DRaaS(Disaster Recovery) as a Service
-SD-WAN

items.name: CloudFactors LLC
items.description:
CloudFactors is a Microsoft Cloud Solutions Partner, building its practice around collaboration, mobility and security with Surface devices, Office 365, Microsoft Intune, Dynamics 365 Business Central and Azure services for small to midmarket businesses.  Our expertise with software licensing, cloud administration services and PC management focuses principally on the legal industry.  Law firms, bar associations and legal professionals rely on us to assess their information technology requirements and deliver appropriate Microsoft hardware and software solutions.

Our industry-leading Technology-as-a-Service solutions unlock the strategic value of Microsoft by bundling device implementation services with Office 365 deployment and Surface hardware.  CloudFactors delivers a complete IT package, pre-configured with Windows 10, Office, and full PC management and security features - ready to unpack and start using at time of delivery. CloudFactors digitally transforms professional practices and creates modern law office environments for busy lawyers, paralegals and their support staff., 

CloudFactors orchestrates superior computing experiences for its commercial, education and non-profit customers. CloudFactors is an Authorized Education Partner and offers professionally facilitated events to showcase Microsoft Office 365 in a Cloud Immersion Experience. CloudFactors serves as a trusted Microsoft Cloud solutions provider to customers in the United States and the United Kingdom. Sales offices are located in Arizona, Florida, Massachusetts, Missouri, and New Hampshire.

items.name: Crayon Software Experts LLC
items.description:
Crayon helps partners and businesses with digital transformation using Microsoft cloud services through the Cloud Service Provider program (CSP). From on-premises to hybrid to full cloud deployment, Crayon will assist at any stage of the process, with a goal of maximizing the return on complex technology investment.

At Crayon, we understand Microsoft Licensing. And although many can transact your licensing requirements, we are expert at driving out cost while maximizing ROI.

Crayon's expertise is Microsoft cloud optimization for both partners and businesses. We specialize in Cloud Services (Office 365, Azure, CRM Online), Security and GDPR,  Software Asset Management (SAM), and Volume Licensing. Our mission is to clarify Microsoft Licensing and help you manage your software licenses while cost-effectively maintaining compliance. In addition, we will serve as your guide to Microsoft Cloud Services.

Microsoft Cloud Services:

•  Cloud Solution Provider (CSP), for Microsoft Partners as well as businesses
•  Microsoft Azure Platform (IaaS)
•  Microsoft Azure Hybrid Networking
•  Office 365 Migrations, Training, Support, and Hybrid Deployments
•  Service Provider License Agreement (SPLA)
•  Microsoft Cloud Readiness

Software Asset Management:

•  License Compliance Help
•  Licensing Reconciliation Projects
•  Corporate Licensing Governance
•  Audit Support
•  Security and GDPR Compliance

Volume License Services:

•  Certified, Dedicated & Friendly Advisors
•  Licensing Education
•  Acquisition & Renewal Management
•  Cloud Licensing Office 365, Azure, CRM Online


We service Office 365, Microsoft Visual Studio, MSDN Subscription, CRM, Sharepoint, SQL Server, Exchange, Office, Windows Server and many more.  Whether your company needs a single license or a comprehensive company-wide license agreement we can assist you to license your Microsoft software. 
Crayon offers MPSA, Enterprise Agreement (EA), Cloud Service Provider (CSP), Service Provider Licensing Agreement (SPLA), Select, Microsoft Open, Microsoft Open Volume, Microsoft Open Value, Microsoft Open Value Subscription, Microsoft Online Services, Microsoft Academic Open, MSDN Subscription licensing.

We are industry-agnostic. We service all industries across the United States and have vast experience including, but not limited to healthcare, finance, manufacturing, education, legal, government, and more.

Crayon has won Microsoft Partner of Year Awards in 2012, 2013, 2014 and 2015

items.name: CCT Technologies, Inc.
items.description:
ComputerLand of Silicon Valley has been providing seamless IT integration for over 25 years as a Microsoft Gold Partner.
Our Microsoft competencies give us the expertise to design comprehensive solutions, that integrate seamlessly into your current environment, adding efficiency and greater performance without compromising security whether it is an on-prem, hybrid or full cloud deployment.  Some of ComputerLand’s cloud services entail: 

Microsoft 365 and Office 365 Implementation, Migration, Support, and Training.
Microsoft Azure (Infrastructure, Backup, Disaster recovery, Active Directory, SQL).
Microsoft Azure Hybrid Computing.
Cloud solution provider (CSP) – Office 365, Azure, Expert Cloud Solution Specialists. 
Cloud Licensing – Office 365, Microsoft 365, Azure, Visio, Project, and Microsoft Dynamics. 
Office 365 Security, Backup, Disaster Recovery, Archiving, and Encryption 

ComputerLand provides services and solutions to Government, Education, and Commercial customers in all regions of the country. 

In addition to providing services, we also provide licensing for Office 365, Microsoft Visual Studio, MSDN Subscription, CRM, SharePoint, SQL Server, Exchange, Office, Windows Server and many other products. ComputerLand offers cloud subscriptions and software under Microsoft licensing programs for all commercial, government and education organizations, such as MPSA, Select Plus, EA, Cloud Service Provider (CSP), Microsoft Open, Microsoft Open Volume, Microsoft Open Value, Microsoft Open Value Subscription, Microsoft Open Value Subscription-Education Solutions (OVS-ES), Enrollment for Education Solutions (EES) and Microsoft Academic Open. ComputerLand can provide a few Individual licenses or a comprehensive organization-wide Microsoft licensing agreements.

items.name: Superior Endeavors, Inc.
items.description:
Your technology ally, helping you succeed one byte at at time!

‘Your’ and ‘you’ refer to our clients.  They are the focus of everything we do.  We distinguish ourselves by putting our clients’ interests ahead of our own.  Our business is not a transactional business; it is a relationship business where client trust is earned and then passionately nurtured.  ‘One byte at a time’ means there is no free lunch and no shortcuts.  It means doing the little things right everyday and linking our success to the success of our clients.

items.name: JXB Consulting, LLC
items.description: IT Managed Services company specializing on Small to Medium Sized Businesses

items.name: GHA Technologies
items.description:
GHA Technologies, Inc. is a nationally expanding network, computer reseller and systems integrator with offices nationwide. GHA is listed as the 18th largest private corporation in Arizona. We sell HP, Dell, IBM, Lenovo, Nimble, EMC, NetApp, Sony, Apple, VMware, Samsung, Fujitsu, APC, Symantec, Panasonic, Microsoft, Intel, Cisco, and all the latest storage, datacenter, virtualization, cloud, security, VoIP, wireless, video and identification technologies. We also specialize in mission-critical product procurement and integration services for some of the largest corporate, government, and educational clients in the US. Our client base is a Who's Who of Corporate America.

GHA is Gold Certified in Cloud Productivity and Small and Midmarket Cloud Solutions.

items.name: Venmar Systems, Inc
items.description: Venmar Systems has been providing servers and networking since before Microsoft NT existed and remote access since before people knew what the Internet was.  We supply a full range of services and can source a project from start to finish, or just focus on one particular aspect depending on our clients' needs.  Site wiring, servers, workstations, networks, internet access, remote access and installation, support and migration to all Microsoft products, are all part of our complete system integration services.

items.name: AboutXtreme
items.description:
We are born-in-the-cloud, minority and women owned – Microsoft Gold Certified – pure play technology startup focused on helping our customers realize the true value of new opportunities through Digital Transformation. With multi-country operations and thousands of hours of experience, our goal is to create amazing outcomes through a results driven approach. As industry moves to cloud and consumption based model, we are excited about keeping pace and aligning to our clients priorities.

•	Founded in early 2014 to deliver affordable consulting and learning services of modern technology 
•	Geographical presence in North America, Europe, Asia and Australasia
•	Microsoft Cloud Solutions Partner (CSP)
•	Microsoft Gold Partner with our focus on the following: 
•	Cloud Platform & Infrastructure
•	Productivity & Mobility 
•	Data Management & Analytics
•	Business Applications
•	Microsoft Managed Partner and P-Seller (in works)
•	Microsoft Approved Vendor (multiple countries)
•	Microsoft Store Devices Partner
•	Microsoft Azure Government Cloud Solutions Reseller
•	Microsoft Consulting Services Sub-contractor
•	Chat BOTs solution - built on aboutxtreme’s advance analytic engine with cognitive components leveraged from Microsoft Cortana Intelligence Suite

items.name: Aerie Consulting
items.description:
At Aerie Consulting it is our mission to help businesses meet their goals more effectively and efficiently through simple, smart and powerful cloud solutions. Our team of professionals brings deep technology expertise in fields as diverse as healthcare, education, architecture and construction, the arts and government systems. We aim to understand your people, your data and your systems and craft solutions that will connect them together seamlessly into a smooth and successful operation ready to tackle the next big opportunity.

How we are different:
- We design for people, not data. All the best technology in the world won’t help your business if it doesn’t work for your employees. Solutions must be intuitive, clean and easy to learn and operate.
- We know our stuff. We have done hundreds of SharePoint Projects. We're the guys the big guys call when they can’t figure it out. We’ve seen it all; nothing is too complicated for us to understand, sort out and develop into solutions that will help your teams meet their goals in less time with less resources.
- We are flexible. We offer planning, development, training and support. We can do all of this for you or any combination of the four. We can be your team or we can support your team. Every business is different and each project is unique. We will meet your needs in the way that works best for you and delivers the best results.

With Aerie as a part of your team, you can concentrate on your business responsibilities, and we'll concentrate on translating your business workflow into data-driven solutions that will automate your processes and put critical business data at your fingertips... anytime, anywhere!

items.name: BAM FM
items.description: We are originally an online radio station, but we have expertise with the Microsoft Solutions. We are a team of 35 certified sales agents and more than 100 in-house support agents to answer your questions 24/7

items.name: Network Systems Plus Inc
items.description:
NetSys+ provides IT consulting services for business.  As a Microsoft Gold Certified Partner, we work with organizations to implement and support technology that is cost efficient and flexible.  

From planning and purchasing to monitoring and support, NetSys+ partners with clients to take the hassle out of IT.

Every business has unique needs and every business, large or small, deserves an expert.

items.name: Nexus Technologies Inc
items.description: NexusTek, an award-winning Microsoft Gold Partner, empowers organizations to lead their market space by taking the burden of optimizing and managing their IT environments, ensuring business continuity and employee productivity. NexusTek delivers Cloud solutions, Managed IT Services, and Application Consulting to more than 500 small and midsize businesses based in Denver, Arizona and across the Front Range. As one of the largest Denver-based IT services firms, we take a customer-centric approach by consulting with the client to understand their business. We then evaluate and recommend the best technology to meet their current and future needs. Our talented team, personalized attention, and 20 years of documented best practices deliver proven results in cloud services, desktop and server support, backup and recovery, CRM/ERP solutions, and network security 24/7/365.

items.name: SOVRAN INC
items.description:
OUR MISSION
​To be the most sought after technology partner in our market. Through custom-tailored and innovative solutions, we will deliver an unmatched experience for our clients. Our work environment will make us a destination for top talent. We focus on the people that make us great; our clients, and employees.
OUR SOLUTION
Sovran provides customized business solutions and ongoing support services that focus on the goals of our clients. We are continually evolving our services, training our staff, and staying on top of industry trends.

items.name: Binnacle Technologies
items.description: Locally owned and operated, Binnacle provides full-service IT support and consulting at reasonable and predictable prices that scale to fit your business.

items.name: Data Network Group, Inc.
items.description:
Data Network Group is a computer consulting firm that provides outsourced IT solutions for small to mid-sized organizations throughout the Front Range of Colorado.  We provide a full spectrum of IT consulting services from computer/server support, technology planning and implementation, procurement and asset management.
 
We specialize in Microsoft products and are a Microsoft Gold Certified Partner. 

DNG’s Problem-Solving Capabilities:

- Computer Support Services 
- Data Backup & Disaster Recovery 
- Strategic IT Planning & Assessment 
- Voice & Data Solutions (VOIP) 
- Cloud Computing Solutions 

We also have the expertise to handle high-level consulting projects such as the following:

- MS Exchange upgrades & migrations 
- Server system upgrades and migrations 
- Microsoft server clustering 
- Off-site backup and recovery systems 
- Microsoft SharePoint Server 
- Data center design and support 
- Standby servers
